title: Big Bend National Park: Volunteer
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer             Volunteer        VIPs Prepare for River Cleanup NPS Photo/Big Bend National Park       Big Bend National Park depends on dedicated volunteers to perform duties and complete projects that would not be completed without their assistance. Approximately 300 volunteers contribute 50,000 hours of work every year. Whether manning our visitor centers and campgrounds or patrolling our backcountry trails, our volunteers protect our valuable resources and help visitors learn about and more safely enjoy the wonders of Big Bend National Park.       Current Volunteer Opportunities
